showScoreExcerpt:
“A spectacle of glamour, glitz, lust, love and romance - the costumes, the sets and strong, stunningly talented cast (Danny Burstein, Karen Olivo, Aaron Tveit, Robyn Hurder) drive ‘Moulin Rouge!’ The 70 songs - or snippets of them - that make up the music can become weary but there's a a bit of nostalgia for everyone.”

Read more
